pullrequest.title: Improve performance, added a script to run multiple tests in parallel

content.raw: I installed the 'parallel' package and the scripts seems to work. I connected one `gzclient` and the robots were there and moving. I didn't wait to see the log files, though. Just waiting on a few minor comments to approve.
content.html: I installed the 'parallel' package and the scripts seems to work. I connected one gzclient and the robots were there and moving. I didn't wait to see the log files, though. Just waiting on a few minor comments to approve.
